quote: Poetry is written with tears, fiction with blood, and history with invisible ink. – Carlos Ruiz Zafon
fact: The citrus soda 7-UP was created in 1929; `7` was selected after the original 7-ounce containers and `UP` for the direction of the bubbles.
joke: How do hens stay fit? They always egg-cercise!
